name: Chris Bell
text: When I walked into this place no one greeted meand said will be with you in just a moment they left me standing there feeling stupid for about 10 minutes. There are glass partitions between the kitchen area and the lobby. At least eight …More

name: Kathy Thomas
text: My whole family loves your pizzas and I also love your salads. Your our favorite pizza restaurant.

name: Zachariah Moore
text: Nice break from the average pizza places. Awesome upbeat staff.

name: Julissa Garcia
text: This is the third night in a row I've tried ordering delivery around 10pm each time no one answered. If you're not going to be open at the listed times you should update your business hours.

name: Nathan Beers
text: What I Like About Blackjack Pizza And Salads Is I Prefer My Pizza With Pepperoni Ham And Anchovies While My Brother Michael Prefers His Pizza With Pepperoni Ham And Spicy Italian Sausage

name: John J
text: I accidentally called in my order to the wrong store. Once I got there I was able to cancel the order at the other store and place it at this store. They did everything they could to get out as fast as possible. And as always great

text: According to their website my address not only appears to be within the delivery zone, my online order went through, AND accepted the order with my Berthoud address. Then 15 min later I get a call saying they don’t deliver to VERY NORTH …More

name: Michele Mann
text: Very rude!!!!  They tell you 15 minutes when it’s 30 min than tell you they got “slammed” when you see no other orders.  I  will not go again.... much better places and without the rude customer service!

name: Harold Truman
text: I love their pan square style....reminds me of a pie we call back east the Sicilian....just the right amount of melty in the cheese,toppings economics are on point....they sometimes crisp the cheese...but i dont mind coz i like my pie …More

text: I ordered from you and never received my order.  5690 Ronald Reagan Blvd.228 I told driver I wasn't at travel lodge address and he had already left food there.  I expect  to get the food i ordered delived to me at Wyndham in Johnstown

name: Dan Trip
text: Used to be 5 star, I don't know what happen? Only place I would eat pizza. We have it every Friday as a family. 5 pies sometimes 6. But last 3 times have been horrible! No cheese very little sauce and 2 pepperoni per slice! We will have …More

name: Corbin Schon
text:
Blackjack Pizza taste great.
I like extra sauce and this is like the only place that actually will put extra sauce on when I ask for it. I love that. When I get delivery, my food comes hot, …More

name: Melissa Yvonne
text: My favorite pizza place! Always fast service and helpful employees. I often make a special trip down from Estes to order pizza from the Loveland location.  Thanks for all your hard work!

name: Scott Hale
text: There was a problem with my order, they fixed it before I even knew it had happened and I was promptly eating top notch pizza. 2 thunbs up guys

name: Myron schweitzer
text: Been years since I have had there pizza. Best take out pizza I have had in years. Wish there was one closer to the Windsor area.

name: Beata McKee
text: I think their pizza is fine but the customer service is lacking. I placed an order for pickup and got there to learn they didn’t have my order. I verified it was the same number and address I had called (which I’ve done several times, so I …More

name: Joseph Ayer
text: Not as greasy as papa John's but still as  bad in that good way. I enjoy the options with the crusts and the deep dish pizza.

name: Robert Webb
text: Best pizza in Loveland for the money. They don't skimp like their competition does.

name: chelsea buss
text: The sauce is flavorful, the pan crust was crispy in all the right places, and I could quite literally drink their ranch. Blew my mind that they sell pints of ice cream and let me tell you the ice cream is just as great as the pizza! I can’t even recommend this place enough!!! Great jobs guys!!! Keep the amazing work up!!!!!

name: Jason Taylor
text: Out of the pizza chains it's by far the best pizza I think

name: Evan palyz
text: Foods yummy, but the employees are sometimes distracted and they are not all customer focused.  The manager is, but he's just one.  It would be great if they all knew how to interact with people.  At least they are good at making good pizzas!

name: Justin Rowlison
text: My pizza on time so that was good but it was pretty badly burned, disappointing!

name: Bill Jensen
text: Loveland, Colo - N. Cleveland location.  I arrived on time to collect my deferred order and within a minute the fresh pizzas were being boxed up.  I served ten people two extra-large pizzas for $25 and tax.  Excellent experience!

name: Edgar Reyes
text: Ordered online and said the pizza would be ready in 30 mins. Got to the store about 40mins later and the order wasn't even started!

name: Courtney Roe
text: Wow! Amazing customer service!! Our pizza was slightly burned. We knew our kinds wouldn’t eat the burnt cheese. We took it back. No questions. New pizza! That’s because Ed said he’d make it right!! I drive out of my way to eat pizza ay at Blackjack.!!

name: Alltek
text: Black jacks is really good pizza but I’m giving 4 stars cause the pan pizza seems really thick and doughy. It would be something to look into like doing a survey on it or something. Regardless, the pizza is one of the Best in town !

name: Gnomei Moondust
text: I had to ask for everything on my order even though the guy had the order in front of him. Aside from that everything was perfect.

name: Richard Payne
text: Salads are fantastic, pizza one of the best.

name: Shiela Torres
text: First time buying from this location and it will be the last.  The pizza was made wrong and over cooked. I live to far to go back.

name: Arlene Sparks
text: Tonight the staff at the Eisenhower/Lincoln location did a Phenomenal job!! Best pizza and dekivery time !! I have Enjoyed Black jack for years ... my Go To Pizza .... my Family's Go To Pizza... Well They Rocked My pizza Tonight ! ! Yummo !!

text: Yo you guys sent me an empty box for real how did you not feel the weight of the box I can understand mistakes but seriously an empty box that is ridiculous

name: Devon Fulford
text: Pizza (and wings, etc.) is consistently decent for the price, but the last couple of times we've been, the order has been wrong. Ordered garlic sauce; didn't receive it. Ordered garlic on the cheese bread; didn't happen. Perhaps there is a trend here...

name: chris finkle
text: Service was horrible. Had to longer than expected. Pizza sauce was to sweet and cheese was hard.

name: Bear Family
text: The square pizzas are pretty good. They actually deliver really fast too. Usually a lot faster than they say they'll be there. Much appreciated.

name: Isaac Weber
text: Say what you want about the pizza, but the customer service at this location is absolutely superb. They were more than happy to change my order, even though it was my fault. Couldn't be more happy with how I was treated here.

text: Amazing pizza and fast delivery Black Jacks is one of my favorite pizza places in Loveland. I highly recommend the Pan Pizza.

text: Ordered a pizza to a motel while in town for a night.  Was pleasantly surprised.  The pizza was delicious, delivered quickly, and did I mention the pizza was delicious?  Would order from here again.

text: "medium jackpot regular crust"... the best pizza for us. they are a little devious on their coupons.... for example "$5 off on premium pizza" does *not* include the jackpot... they say it has so much meat etc that it is above premium.  you cannot always trust the coupon with these people.

The place in Loveland for some hot, fresh, handmade Zza!

text: Blackjack Pizza has saved my NBA playoff parties!  Food is great, fast, and everyone loves the pizza and is much better than other Loveland pizza options...

text: Price is good and rivals most "everyday pizza places". Toppings were really good but was just too "everday" for me. A lot like box stores when it came to the crust. If your looking for a good priced everday pizza this is for you.

text: Great service and food. Very happy with them.

text: Sorry, your pizza is awesome but calling in to order for delivery is horrific.  Far to much background noise.  Will not order until you fix the issue.
